Screenwriter: Antoine Jaccoud, Ursula Meier, Gilles Taurand
Production Co: Bande à part Films, Archipel 35, RTS - Radio Télévision Suisse, Vega Films
Synopsis: A poor boy (Léa Seydoux) steals from wealthy patrons at a posh ski resort to support himself and his irresponsible older sister (Kacey Mottet Klein).
Title: Sister
